citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:50 pm to
4:30 pm on 03/08/2016.
Inspector knocked on the door, called the cell number provided, left a message, and waited 40 minutes at the
facility.
